Text: Thank you for calling Triple-A bank.
My name is Arianna. How can I assist you today?
Hello David! How can I help you today?

column5: I noticed some unexpected charges on my account
column6: and I need help sorting them out.

Text: Let me check your account to see what really happened.
I'll just need to verify your account details first
Thank you for that. Let me quickly look up your account.
It looks like there was an incorrect fee applied to your account. Let me see how we can resolve this.

column5: I see. That doesnâ€™t seem right. What can be done to fix it?

Text: We can remove that fee and refund it to your account. It will take 3-5 business days to process.
That sounds great! Thank you for taking care of that.

column5: David! Is there anything else I can help you with today?
that should be everything. Thanks again for your help!

Text: It was a pleasure assisting you. Have a wonderful day!
